rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entry with a foyer and reception area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that maximize natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space with Mediterranean accents, large bay windows for ample daylight.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and living area; designed for comfortable family meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped Mediterranean-style kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows and modern appliances.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom ensuring privacy and ample storage.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Dedicated area for laundry, storage, and other ancillary services.

openings.description: Door with floor-to-ceiling window detailing for a welcoming entrance.
Large French doors leading into the foyer with Mediterranean motifs.
Access to the central courtyard from the kitchen and dining area.
